title: Sales transactions - determine knowledge from data

content.question: Which of the following is most easily determined from the data in the data set?

choices.label: Customer purchasing preferences by category for each store location
Customer satisfaction levels by category for each date
The name of the most popular product at each location
The quantity available for each product at each store location

content.answer: Customer purchasing preferences by category for each store location

topic.text: 4.1: Ethical and Social Issues Around Data Collection

skill.text: 1.B: Determine what knowledge can be extracted from data.
